title.narrative: Förstudie inför att stödja demokratiskt maktskifte i DRK
Pre-study of Supporting Democratic Transition in DRC

description.narrative:
Palmecentret har sökt stöd av Sida för en förstudie i Demokratiska republiken Kongo (DRK) för att öka sin förståelse av det politiska landskapet, identifiera möjliga förändringsaktörer och för att ytterligare kontextualisera sina tidigare erfarenheter och dra slutsatser för möjliga insatser för att ge stöd till den fragila och på många sätt fortfarande pågående demokratiska maktskiftet.
Förstudien förväntas ta tre månader och den totala budgeten, inklusive projektledare, handläggare och controller, såväl som en tre veckors studieresa till DRK, är 310 000 SEK.

The Palme Center has applied to Sida for funding a pre-study in the Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) to increase their understanding of the political landscape, identify possible change agents, further contextualise their previous experiences and draw conclusions for possible interventions to support the fragile, and in many ways still pending, democratic transition.
The objective of the pre-study is to explore possibilites for future interventions in the field of supporting democratic transition. It is anticipated that the Palme Center will be able to identify interventions that would support the organisational development, capacity building and policy development of political parties and political representatives, including emerging and not yet fomalised actors of change in the DRC. The pre-study shall enquire the ideas of interventions to 1) support women in politics; 2) Suppport the establishment of an institute for voter education; and 3) Identify change agents capable and interested in pushig for reforms.
The pre-study is expected to take three months and the total budget, including programme manager, staff and controller as well as a three weeks long mission in DRC, is 310 000 SEK.

The objective of the pre-study was to assess the possibilities of a contribution of the Palme Center to support the democratic development in DRC and the formation of long lasting relations between the Palme Centre and local actors in DRC.

tag.narrative: 16.7 - Ensure responsive, inclusive, participatory and representative decision-making at all levels.
16.7 - Säkerställa ett lyhört, inkluderande, deltagandebaserat och representativt beslutsfattande på alla nivåer.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: As stated in the assessment of the pre-study report, the pre-study has led to the engineering of a full project that the embassy will appraise and hopefully initiate very soon. The pre-study thus served its purpose and lead to a well-designed project proposal in which local stakeholders have participated actively. The level of local ownership is therefore high, and the project well adapted to the local context and political situation.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
